selections.name: Haida Gwaii
selections.reason: Chasing 5 wins in a row. Won last start at this track/distance beating key rival Sinful Living. Proven performer.

selections.name: Amaroo Star
selections.reason: Won last two starts impressively. Beat Tycoon Harry last time out. Drawn well in barrier 3 to sit on speed.

selections.name: Sinful Living
selections.reason: Consistent mare, runner-up to Haida Gwaii last start. Carries top weight but has class.

selections.name: Tycoon Harry
selections.reason: Runner-up to Amaroo Star last start. Consistent type who maps well from barrier 2.

danger_horse.name: Amaroo Star
danger_horse.reason: In career-best form and receives weight from the top pick.

selections.name: Sound Of Speed
selections.reason: Won well at this track/distance last start. Drawn perfectly in barrier 2 to get a soft run.

selections.name: She's Hot
selections.reason: Solid 3rd last start behind a smart one. Won maiden prior. Improving filly.

selections.name: Twisted Steel
selections.reason: Fitter for recent run. Has shown ability in better races previously.

selections.name: Bassett Hound
selections.reason: Unlucky not to finish closer on debut. Can improve significantly here.

danger_horse.name: She's Hot
danger_horse.reason: Consistent form and maps to be competitive.

selections.name: Daryte
selections.reason: Dominant 3L winner on debut at this track. Drawn barrier 1. Looks a class above this field.

selections.name: Properata
selections.reason: Runner-up on debut and has trialled well since. The main danger despite the wide draw.

selections.name: Farnova
selections.reason: Chased Daryte home last start for 2nd. Meets winner on similar terms but has place claims.

selections.name: Here The Boom
selections.reason: Trial winner on debut. Watch betting.

selections.name: Sonoftheboss
selections.reason: Won last start beating Fancy Red. Consistent performer at this level.

selections.name: Fancy Red
selections.reason: Runner-up to Sonoftheboss last time. Gets a 4lb weight swing in her favor and drawn barrier 1.

selections.name: Supernatural
selections.reason: Class runner. 5th last start but won well prior. Can bounce back.

selections.name: Horcrux
selections.reason: Resuming from a spell. Won a recent trial and has first-up ability.

danger_horse.name: Fancy Red
danger_horse.reason: Weight swing and barrier draw bring her right into contention.

selections.name: Rally The Troops
selections.reason: Solid 3rd two starts back. Forgive last run. Drawn well to bounce back.

selections.name: On Patrol
selections.reason: Consistent type. 4th last start and has good track stats.

selections.name: Touretto
selections.reason: 3rd last start at this track. Racing well enough to feature.

selections.name: Rapid Rock
selections.reason: Won two starts back. 4th last time out. In the mix.

danger_horse.name: On Patrol
danger_horse.reason: Reliable veteran in an open race.

selections.name: Forever Dreaming
selections.reason: Runner-up last start. Consistent form and drawn to get a lovely run.

selections.name: Mangifera
selections.reason: Chasing a hat-trick after two wins. Wide draw is the concern but form is irresistible.

selections.name: Show The Way
selections.reason: 2nd last start at big odds. Proved that was no fluke.

selections.name: Defending
selections.reason: Class runner with top weight. 4th last start. Barrier 1 helps.

danger_horse.name: Mangifera
danger_horse.reason: Winning form is the best form, despite the wide gate.

selections.name: River Rubicon
selections.reason: Runner-up to the scratched favorite Silver Eye last start. Clear top pick with that rival out.

selections.name: Famous Dain
selections.reason: Won last start at this track. Racing in great heart.

selections.name: Bruce Almighty
selections.reason: Veteran who is always competitive. 5th last start in a strong race.

selections.name: Battle Commander
selections.reason: 4th last start, won prior. Consistent.

danger_horse.name: Famous Dain
danger_horse.reason: In winning form and looks the main threat.

selections.name: Redback Flyer
selections.reason: 4th last start in a mile race. Won prior. Looks well placed here.

selections.name: Cashel Palace
selections.reason: 6th last start but won well prior. Drawn ideally in barrier 2.

selections.name: Desennea
selections.reason: 3rd last start. Consistent type who maps well from the inside.

selections.name: Deamber
selections.reason: Runner-up last start. Holding form well.

danger_horse.name: Cashel Palace
danger_horse.reason: Can bounce back to winning form from the good draw.
